message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 60/40 split seems reasonable for us to settle this quickly.
Let's try 55/45, it's more reasonable for me.
Bob, this is a concession. Time is running out and it would be a shame to lose more money to inflation.
You're right, time is running out, but I think I deserve a bit more.
Bob, I'm trying to be reasonable, but this back and forth is not helping.  We both lose if we don't agree soon.

Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point. Take it or leave it.
